document.full_text: golfing greats arnold palmer and jack nicklaus launched the 75th masters on thursday while three-times champion phil mickelson prepared to begin his title defense later in the day.
document.title: palmer and nicklaus officially launch masters
lines_and_colors: golfing greats arnold palmer and jack nicklaus launched the 75th masters on thursday while three-times champion phil mickelson prepared to begin his title defense later in the day.
